column2: I figure it‚Äôs about time I finally start up commissions. I‚Äôve never done commissions before
column3: so I‚Äôd like to first start off by saying that. Please bare with me if I‚Äôm a little confusing or strange at times and feel free to send me critique‚Äôs on my business managing! The reason I‚Äôm taking on commissions now is because of two reasons! 1. I recently just got done taking a leave of absence from work to go to inpatient therapy (a mental health hospital if you will) and no longer have any savings
column4: as it was all spent on food to support my husband
column6: friends and snakes. 2. I‚Äôm helping one of my close friends get out of his abusive household and extra money would be helpful if things go wrong. I don‚Äôt want him to move from the south of North America all the way up to the north only to be homeless and/or starving! I have some very important rules about payment: I require half of payment up front. I don‚Äôt want to be ripped off and neither do you. I will update you on progress on your commission if you request it so that you know that your piece is getting done.¬† If your commission takes too long for your liking or is unsatisfactory to you I will refund you with that half of the money. If I can make changes to an unsatisfactory piece I will as soon as possible for no extra cost. Once a piece is finished I will show it via email as a watermarked version
column7: this way it can not be refunded and stolen. If it is satisfactory I will send you the un-watermarked piece after receiving the other half of payment. Here‚Äôs what I can do: Icons of characters with backgrounds humans anthro-furries humanoid robots animals smut (must provide proof that you are 18+
column8: sorry I will not risk it) gore/guro¬† Here‚Äôs what I can‚Äôt do: Automobiels and machines furry smutt characters without reference images or highly detailed descriptions extremely detailed backgrounds (hard lined and colored sceneries) smut of minors (it‚Äôs bad. no pedo‚Äôs allowed!) Reference images are below the cut
column9: as I do not want to clog your dashboard! If you have trouble viewing the images from my blog
column11: IM me or E-mail me at aristotleryans@gmail.com! I‚Äôll provide examples and prices for you! I will take 3 commissions at a time to start
column12: if all goes well I will upgrade to 5.¬† 1. OPEN2. OPEN3. OPEN Keep reading " False text

column1: delsinsfire 162443665633 "2017-06-30 19:03:53 GMT" http://delsinsfire.tumblr.com/post/162443665633/i-only-have-my-ps3-around-at-the-moment-and-the "I only have my PS3 around at the moment and the internet wasn‚Äôt working so I thought what the hell
column2: I‚Äôm gonna play Oblivion. It has been lying around here for ages and I‚Äôve never had the opportunity to play. So I start the game
column3: create my abomination of a character and suffer through the horrible facial animations until I get to the part where you‚Äôre in the sewers or whatever and have to protect the emperor. He‚Äôs in a little room and his guards are outside
column4: fighting off evil assassins. And I think
column5: since I‚Äôm the hero of this adventure
column6: I gotta help kill the assassins right? And so I kill them. A lot of them. They keep coming. Soon
column7: there is a literal mountain of dead assassins in the room. They still swarm into the room like they‚Äôre being mass produced by some android assassin machine. And I‚Äôm starting to think the game glitched since it‚Äôs a Bethesda game. Turns out you actually have to not fight the bad guys and go into the room with the emperor who then tells your that he can‚Äôt go any further because ??? Like‚Ä¶dude
column8: I‚Äôve been killing those fucks out there for the past 15 minutes
column9: you could‚Äôve gone and hid somewhere in the meantime. But no
column11: patienty watching me kill 827572 assassins without moving. Only to be killed by yet another one as soon as I enter the room. And I‚Äôm not saying he‚Äôs an idiot
column12: but someone who watches a no-name prisoner kill people who were hired to murder him instead of fleeing doesn‚Äôt deserve to be emperor" True text
